name: POSITIVE AWARENESS SERVICE SOCIETY
briefDescription: POSITIVE AWARENESS SERVICE SOCIETY (PASS), a registered voluntary organization comes under the Society Registration Act, Registration number: 111/1995. It is a non-profit making service organization committee for the empowerment of rural asset less voiceless and powerless people from the year 1995, which was formed by local youth for their wellness of their own community. From the date of its inception, PASS is meaningfully contributing for the empowerment of the rural and tribe poor people in the  of Tiruvannamalai District Tamil nadu, India.Unit of pass:               We have one unit, which is called St.Xavierâ€™s medical academy. Its Main Aim is to train the educated girls for their employment and fulfill the medical need of their own community.
